text: Va hec pajomʙarero nafiristodem, magar ʙaroi in ki ʙa farmoni Alloh taolo [mardum az vaj] itoat kunand va agar hangome ki onon [ʙo gunohu nofarmoni] ʙar xestan sitam mekardand, [to zinda hasti] nazdat meomadand va az Alloh taolo omurzis mexostand, ʙe tardid Allohro tavʙapaziri mehruʙon mejoftand
